explanation: Funds are required in the Other Combat Operations budget line item (BLI) to support theater wide shortfalls in tactical materials, deployable air traffic control and landing equipment and Automated Target recognition (ATR) maintenance in support of Ukraine. Addressing these requirements is necessary to properly support Ukraine. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available in the Flying Hours Program BLI due to under-execution driven by real world challenges that were unforeseeable and could not be overcome in the year of execution. Significant impacts on Flying Hour execution are attributed to first quarter winter weather conditions, fleet maintenance challenges, supply chain delays, and continued aircraft delivery delays all hampered flying hour execution levels. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.

Funds are required in the Combat Development Activities Sub Activity Group (SAG) for a classified effort. Additional classified details will be provided under separate cover. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available in the Operational Support SAG due to project delays for the purchase of temporary trailer/facilities, resulting in an available source for higher priority Ukraine requirements. This is a congressional special interest item, This is emergency budget funding.

Funds are required to support procurement and installation of Radomes for Mobile Integrated Ground Suite to provide system protection, enabling persistent operations in support of Ukraine. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget requirement.

Funds are available as the original cost estimate did not consider equipment that was available from stocks at a lower cost. This is 2 Patriot Battery funding. This is a congressional special interest item. This is emergency budget funding.
